meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Plantago, especially Plantago lanceolata, with narrow leaves and small white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The ribworts in the garden have delicate white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I picked some ribworts to study their leaves.
meanings.sent3: The ribworts seemed to wave hello in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Among the greenery, the ribworts stood out like tiny dancers.
meanings.sent5: The ribworts added a touch of elegance to the landscape.

meanings.definition: The leaves of such a plant, used in herbal medicine for their healing properties.
meanings.sent1: Grandma brewed a tea with ribworts to help with my cold.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist recommended ribworts for their healing effects.
meanings.sent3: The ribworts in the potion gave it a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: The healing power of ribworts amazed the villagers.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of ribworts filled the room with a soothing scent.
